publication.title: Dynamic basis pursuit regularization for complex biochemical pathway identification
Feature Sensitivity on Biochemical Signaling Pathways
publication.jconf: Symposium on Computational Intelligence in Bioinformatics and Computational Biology

publication.title: Minimum entropy parameter estimation: Application to the RKIP regulated ERK signaling pathway
Using ToolBook authoring tool to facilitate the teaching of algorithms
publication.abstract: An application is developed and used in teaching the subject of algorithms. It is used in classroom practice, at Lyceum and the University. The results show that the application increased students interest, helped the students to realize the importance of the algorithums and their workings, and grasp some abstract computer science concepts.
